alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 8:46PM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR THIS EVENING IS CANCELLED AS THE WIND HAS DIED DOWN FOR THE EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA AND NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS... * WINDS...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts of 35 to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly. Use caution if engaging in activities that may result in a fire starting.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
